soen6441.team01.warzone.controller

Class IssueOrderController

  • java.lang.Object
    • soen6441.team01.warzone.model.Phase
      • soen6441.team01.warzone.controller.GamePlayController
        • soen6441.team01.warzone.controller.IssueOrderController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGamePlayController, IGameplayOrderDatasource

    public class IssueOrderController
extends GamePlayController
implements IGamePlayController, IGameplayOrderDatasource
    Warzone game play controller. Manages the coordination and progression of the game play phase.

      • processGamePlayCommand

        public IOrder processGamePlayCommand(java.lang.String p_cmd,
                                     IPlayerModel l_player_clone)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Process the game play command:
        • deploy countryName num_reinforcements
        • advance countrynamefrom countynameto numarmies
        • bomb countryName (requires bomb card)
        • blockade countryName (required blockade card)
        • airlift sourcecountryName targetcountryName numarmies (requires the airlift card)
        • negotiate playerName (requires the diplomacy card)
        • showmap
        • showcards
        • end (end turn)
        • exit (exit game)
        • help
        advance Italy France 5
        Parameters:
        p_cmd - user full command
        l_player_clone - the player to get and process commands for
        Returns:
        the order, null = order not fulfilled - try again
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - unexpected error
